data.Summary:
Information Security leadership at the intersection of technology and business.

Agile transformation, cloud strategy, information security and operational excellence all demand business-driven decisions in technical domains.  My experience in leading transformational change in organizations large and small is built on demonstrated technical skills combined with deep understanding of business imperatives and the ability to successfully coach teams through change.
data.Title: SVP, Chief Information Security Officer

positions.Title: VP, ECommerce Technology Security and Risk
positions.Description: Leading technology risk management, PCI compliance, IT security governance, access management, application security and security awareness functions for the enterprise.

positions.Title: GVP, Website Delivery Services
positions.Description: As the leader of Website Delivery Services for macys.com and bloomingdales.com, my team built and supported one of the largest and most stable and high-performing proprietary ecommerce applications in the world, and helped drive years of double-digit growth for two of America’s most exciting and innovative brands.

positions.Title: VP, Website Development Services
positions.Description:
In 2010, I moved to the Vice President role in Website Development, taking on leadership of the content engineering and project management functions in addition to continuing to lead engineering and architecture.  During this period, we grew the team to several hundred software delivery professionals, began working with staff augmentation vendors in India, Russia, Ukraine and Brazil, and migrated our legacy monolithic application to a massively scalable service-based architecture.

The substantial improvements we made in application architecture supported massive growth in our online business and continues to serve as the foundation for web and mobile commerce for Macy's.

positions.Title: Director, Web Site Development
positions.Description: This was the first of a series of progressively senior roles at Macy's managing the engineering function for its two retail websites, macys.com and bloomingdales.com.  When I joined in this role, the team was small - approximately fifteen people - and based entirely in SF.

positions.Title: Director, Implementation Services
positions.Description: Innovative Interfaces is the world's leading integrated library systems platform, providing cataloging, circulation, acquisitions and periodicals management capabilities.  In this role, I led a team of 65 library systems professionals who implemented newly purchased systems for our customers in 42 countries.  We delivered over 100 systems implementations each year, for libraries including the Sorbonne and BNF in Paris, the Library of Congress, and public libraries all over the world.

positions.Title: Vice President, Editorial Systems Development
positions.Description: At Gale Group, part of Thomson Learning, I led the engineering team who completely re-platformed a massive system for importing, cataloging, indexing and editing up to 60,000 periodical articles per day.  We were able to deliver a web-based solution that allowed the company to completely revolutionize their approach to managing editorial services.

positions.Title: Vice President, Engineering
positions.Description: At Dialog, I managed the project management and content engineering functions for what was, at the time, the worlds largest online commercial database.  After the acquisition by Thomson, I helped plan the migration of Dialog data and functionality to the Thomson West publishing platform.

positions.Title: Director, Product Development
positions.Description: Led the product development and delivery functions for the industry-leading general aviation compliance publishing company.  In this role, I was able to use my expertise in XML-based publishing and process design to streamline workflows and create a more flexible electronic publishing process.
